full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 102 of 261 1263 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 A. Yes. 2 Q. Now, I want to speak to you for a few minutes about your interactions with Epstein; okay? 3 A. Yes. Okay. 4 Q. You were aware that sometime toward the late 2000s, Epstein was incarcerated; correct? 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. And you sent him pictures while he was in jail, didn't you? 7 A. I didn't recall that. 8 Q. Do you recall having emailed correspondence with him? 9 A. Yes. 10 Q. Do you recall that he asked for pictures and you agreed to send him pictures? 11 A. I don't recall that. 12 Q. During the course of your preparation with the government, were you shown any of the emails that you had with Jeffrey Epstein? 13 A. Sorry. Is the question, was I shown by the government my emails? 14 Q. Yes. 15 A. No. 16 Q. Did you talk to the government about emails? 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. And did you talk about having sent pictures to Jeffrey Epstein while he was in jail? 19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018439
